text: Ennio Doris (3 July 1940 â€“ 24 November 2021) was an Italian billionaire businessman. He founded Mediolanum SpA. Until September 2021, he was chairman of Banca Mediolanum, part of Gruppo Mediolanum. He was born in Tombolo, Italy. Doris died on 24 November 2021 in Milan, Italy at the age of 81.Banca Mediolanum, morto il fondatore Ennio Doris ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian businesspeople Category:People from Veneto Category:People from Milan Category:Province of Padua
title: Ennio Doris
